text: Mateo Stamatov (; born 22 March 1999) is a Bulgarian professional footballer who plays for Levski Sofia as a defender. Although he predominantly plays as a left-back, he has also been deployed as a left winger. ==Club career== Born in Pazardzhik, Stamatov moved with his family to Barcelona, Spain when he was an infant. At the age of 7 he joined a local team before joining Espanyol in 2011.Баба води Матео по стъпките на идола му Мартин Петров topsport.bg Four years later he signed a professional contract with the team.Един от най- големите ни таланти подписа с Еспаньол blitz.bg On 3 February 2019, Stamatov returned to Bulgaria and signed a contract with Septemvri Sofia.Септември привлече Матео Стаматов fcseptemvri.com He made his professional debut in a league match against Ludogorets Razgrad on 16 March 2019.Лудогорец разгроми Септември с 6:0 dariknews.bg In August 2020, Stamatov joined Levski Sofia, signing a one-year contract. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |Septemvri Sofia |2018–19 |First League |3||0||1||0||colspan="2"|—||4||0 |- |UA Horta |2019–20 |Tercera División |21||1||1||0||colspan="2"|—||22||1 |- |Levski Sofia |2020–21 |First League |0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !24!!1!!2!!0!!0!!0!!26!!1 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1999 births Category:Bulgarian footballers Category:Bulgaria youth international footballers Category:FC Septemvri Sofia players Category:PFC Levski Sofia players Category:First Professional Football League (Bulgaria) players Category:Association football defenders Category:Sportspeople from Pazardzhik
